column4: Hey. About the w32codecs package listed on the wiki; it doesn't seem to be there anymore. Anyone know what is up?
you need to download it by hand from http://www.debian-multimedia.org/pool/main/w/w32codecs/w32codecs_20060611-0.0_i386.deb
I think that version should work, although I seem to have a much older one installed
